title: EU vote: Where the cabinet and other MPs stand
content:
A deal has been done on renegotiating the UK's terms of membership of the EU and David Cameron has announced a 23 June referendum on whether the UK should stay in, or leave, the European Union.
How do government ministers and MPs from all the parties in the House of Commons line up? The tallies are changing and will be updated.
* Jo Cox, Labour MP for Batley and Spen, backed the Remain campaign before her death on 16 June. 
Those who want to remain in the EU:
* Members who attend cabinet
Those who want the UK to leave the EU:
* Members who attend cabinet
**Attends Conservative political cabinet meetings
Remain camp
